units.title: Day 0 wash and add phase I medium
units.text: Day 0. Before initiating the differentiation, first aspirate the culture medium and wash with 1 ml of PBS, before adding 1 ml of the phase I medium (Table 6).
units.rationale: Establishes a clean baseline and introduces the first differentiation medium.

units.title: Replace medium on days 2 and 3
units.text: Days 2 and 3. Replace with 1.2 ml of fresh phase 1 medium.
units.rationale: Maintains consistent signaling during early differentiation.

units.title: Switch to phase II medium on day 4
units.text: On day 4, aspirate the phase I medium and add 1.2 ml of phase II medium (Table 6).
units.rationale: Transitions cells from primitive streak to posterior intermediate mesoderm.

units.title: Switch to phase III medium on day 7
units.text: On day 7, aspirate the phase II medium and add 1.2 ml of phase III medium (Table 6).

units.title: Form iNPC aggregates for organoid generation
units.text: Seed ~25,000–30,000 iNPCs into one well of a 96-well U-bottom low-attachment plate in 100 µl of hNPSR-v2 medium and then centrifuge the plate at 300g for 5 min.
units.rationale: Creates uniform cell aggregates that serve as organoid precursors.

units.title: Transfer aggregates to Transwell for air‑liquid culture
units.text: The iNPC aggregates are transferred to the membrane of a Transwell for air–liquid interface culture.
units.rationale: Provides a physiologically relevant environment for nephron development.

units.title: Change to phase II medium after initial Transwell incubation
units.text: Place the Transwell plate in the incubator for 1 h. After 1 h, remove the phase I medium and directly add 1 ml of phase II medium (Table 7) into the bottom chamber of the Transwell plate.
units.rationale: Initiates the second stage of organoid differentiation while removing residual CHIR99021.

units.title: Introduce phase III medium on day 5
units.text: Day 5. Remove the phase II medium and add 1 ml of phase III medium (Table 7) into the bottom chamber of the Transwell plate.
units.rationale: Supports maturation of nephron cell types in the developing organoid.

units.title: Passage expanded iNPCs
units.text: Day 0. If continuing after FACS (Step 31A or C), count the cells with a TC20 automated cell counter and seed ~120,000 cells per well to one Matrigel-coated well of a 12-well plate with 1 ml of hNPSR-v2 medium.
units.rationale: Ensures continued expansion and maintenance of iNPCs after purification.

units.title: Cryopreserve iNPCs for long‑term storage
units.text: 200,000–1,000,000 cells can be frozen in 0.5 ml of Bambanker cell freezing medium per cryovial (1.5-ml Nalgene SYSTEM 100 cryogenic vial).
units.rationale: Allows preservation of iNPC lines for future experiments.
